title: Circle

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Once a latex successfully transfurs someone, you may roleblock another player at night.

desc:
Post 2897
*"Just one of the two... err... "kitsune" creatures Dr.████ has worked on since his term started. I think that he might make 7 more of these things. They're kind creepy though, just the tail?"-Dr.███████,  MIT.*
